decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - The proposed development, by reason of the shortfall in the minimum gross internal area for the upper floors unit, would result in a cramped and substandard quality of living accommodation for the potential future occupiers, to the detriment of their residential amenity, contrary to the high quality design aspirations of the National Planning Policy Framework (2021), Policy D6 of The London Plan (2021), policies DM1 and DM 26 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013), the Technical Housing Standards Nationally Described Space Standards (2015), the Mayor of London Supplementary Planning Guidance (2016) and the adopted Residential Design Guide Supplementary Planning Document (2010).

Reason : 2 - Notwithstanding reason No. 1, in the absence of sectional drawings, it has not been demonstrated that the floor to ceiling heights of this residential unit, would be acceptable and that the proposal would not create a poor standard of living accommodation for  the potential future occupiers, to the detriment of their residential amenity, contrary to the National Planning Policy Framework (2019), Policy D6 of The London Plan (2021), Policies DM 1 and DM 26 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013), the Mayor of London Supplementary Planning Guidance Housing (2016),  and the adopted Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Design Guide   (2010).
description: Alterations and extension to roof to form end gable; rear dormer; window in end gable; three rooflights in front roofslope to create additional habitable space for first floor flat (1 x 2 beds); front entrance canopy; external step to front; external alterations
